code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrderForm=()=>{const[patientId,setPatientId]=useState("");const[testType,setTestType]=useState("");const[response,setResponse]=useState(null);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post("/order",{patientId,testType});setResponse(res.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error ordering test:",error);setResponse(error.response?error.response.data:"Error");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Order Test"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Patient ID:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:patientId,onChange:e=>setPatientId(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Test Type:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:testType,onChange:e=>setTestType(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Order"})]}),response&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Response"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:JSON.stringify(response,null,2)})]})]});};export default OrderForm;
